issue.title: [CF 182] Meta ICON have error
issue.body:
all fixed in r55,thanks for hard work
R54 fixed the conditions
1.Meta Icon's conditions not working.it's always shown out combat or don't have target
2.Cooldown and Cooldown text

I have 2 target to attack,at first i cast Sunder Armor on A,and cast Colossus Smash ,i switch target to B,when I switch back target A,
Meta Icon only show Colossus Smash's icon ,don't have cooldown and cooldown text.

``` { ["Type"] = "meta", ["Conditions"] = { { ["Type"] = "EXISTS", ["Unit"] = "target", }, -- [1] { ["Type"] = "ALIVE", ["Unit"] = "target", }, -- [2] { ["Type"] = "COMBAT", }, -- [3] { ["Type"] = "REACT", ["Level"] = 1, ["Unit"] = "target", }, -- [4] }, ["Enabled"] = true, ["Icons"] = { "TellMeWhen_Group6_Icon8", -- [1] "TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon3", -- [2] }, }, ```

Group5_Icon3

``` { ["ManaCheck"] = true, ["ShowTimer"] = true, ["Type"] = "cooldown", ["CooldownShowWhen"] = "always", ["CooldownCheck"] = true, ["RangeCheck"] = true, ["Enabled"] = true, ["Name"] = "Colossus Smash", ["UseActvtnOverlay"] = true, }, -- [3] ```

Group6_Icon8

``` { ["ShowTimer"] = true, ["BuffOrDebuff"] = "HARMFUL", ["Unit"] = "target", ["Type"] = "buff", ["FakeHidden"] = true, ["Enabled"] = true, ["Name"] = "Sunder Armor", ["BuffShowWhen"] = "absent", }, -- [8] ```


TMW version is R53
thanks all your hard work.
sorry for my bad english.
